str2: To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: A primary verb; to convince; by analogy, to pacify or conciliate; reflexively or passively, to assent, to rely.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural

str2: From dike; equitable; by implication, innocent, holy.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To set at naught, ignore, despise. A variation of exoudenoo and meaning the same.
Left, left behind, the remainder, the rest, the others. Masculine plural of a derivative of leipo; remaining ones.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
From paraballo; a similitude, i.e. fictitious narrative, apothegm or adage.
